opinion.caption: WILLIAM ROSE OKLAHOMA HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION
opinion.opinion_text: OPINION — AG — THE HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION MAY NOT ACCEPT GIFTS, GRANTS OR BEQUESTS ITSELF BUT SUCH GIFTS, GRANTS AND BEQUESTS MAY BE ACCEPTED BY THE GOVERNOR FOR THE COMMISSION. CITE: 74 O.S. 1965 Supp., 951-954 [74-951] — [74-954], 60 O.S. 1961 383 [60-383], 60 O.S. 1961 384 [60-384], 60 O.S. 1961 385 [60-385] (ROBERT NAIFEH)
